name: Idle Cannon Quest
description:
Download: Get it free!

Ready to become a monster hunter?

Nobody has managed to hunt them all, do you think you can?

Upgrade your cannon, get new types of bullets, unlock weapons for Old Uncle Randy...

How far will you be able to go?

In Idle Cannon Quest you will earn coins even when you are not playing, collect your earnings and prepare for the hunt.

Do not forget to maintain the temperature of your weapon to don't overheat it, the monsters will take advantage of it to recover.

Will you be at the top of the "Top Hunters" world leaderboard?

HIGLIGHTS IN IDLE CANNON QUEST

✨ Simple controls!

✨ Easy to play! Hard to master!

✨ 8 worlds full of monsters!

✨ Offline and completely free

✨ No lifes, hunt with no limits!

✨ Earn coins without playing!

✨ Unique reward system!

✨ Tons of upgrades and skills!

✨ Have a break hunting monsters!

✨ Top hunters world leaderboard!

Are you determined to become the best monster hunter?

Let the hunt begin in Idle Cannon Quest!
